songs.title: Natale’s Song
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I'm in the wars
Can't speak for crying
Close all the doors
Since I am dying
Pick up the phone
Attempt to call her
I'm all alone
Until she answers

[Hook]
Momentarily, she brings peace to me
Momentarily, she brings peace to me

[Verse 2]
She barely speaks
But I hear her breathing
And that's all I need
Someone who's listening
And still she stays
Her time is precious
Until I am safe
She gives her presence

[Hook]
Momentarily, she brings peace to me
Momentarily, she brings peace to me
Momentarily, she brings peace to me
Momentarily, she brings peace to me
